description: Semantically redundant or unnatural verb+tense combinations to exclude from generation

exclusions.reason: Verb 'gerektirmek' (to require/necessitate) is semantically redundant with necessity mood (gereklilik_kipi). Creates unnatural constructions like 'I must require'.
Verb contains 'istemek' (to want) which is redundant with desiderative/optative mood (istek_kipi).
Verb already expresses ability (-abil- suffix) which is redundant with potential mood (imkan_kipi). Creates 'I can be able to' constructions.
Verb already expresses obligation, redundant with necessity/obligation moods.

notes: These combinations are grammatically valid but semantically awkward
LLMs struggle to generate natural examples for these pairs
Exclusions improve generation quality and reduce API costs
Can be overridden with --force-all flag if needed for linguistic completeness
